title: Number of vehicles imported into the United States by country 2012
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Imports in units for 5 number of Countrys.
The maximum Imports in units 2441298.0 is found at Country Japan and the minimum is found at Germany where Country is 796121.0.
The maximum Country Japan has got 3.07 times higher Imports in units than the minimum Country Germany.

max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Imports in units in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Imports in units 2441298.0 is found at Country Japan and the minimum is found at Germany where Country is 796121.0.
Country Canada has the second highest value for Imports in units.
The difference of Imports in units between the highest and lowest Country is 1645177.0.
Imports in units at Country Japan is 2441298.0 , second place is Canada at 2105848.0, and thirdly is Mexico at 1440116.0.
The Country Germany has 1.56 times less Imports in units than average.
